thread.title: Shocking: You'll Not Believe Salman Khan Hated This About Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
thread.title_full: Shocking: You'll Not Believe Salman Khan Hated This About Prem Ratan Dhan Payo

title: Shocking: You'll Not Believe Salman Khan Hated This About Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
text:
Posted by: Puri Published: Wednesday, October 14, 2015, 16:27 [IST] 
Salman Khan 's Prem Ratan Dhan Payo is one of the most awaited films of this year. But you will not believe that Salman did not like the movie's title at all, infact it has been reported the actor would have said no to the film if any other director apart from Sooraj Barjatya had approached him with this title. 
Sooraj Barjatya who is the director of Prem Ratan Dhan Payo came with this title. According to him this unique title came to his mind when he was meditating. The movie's title is inspired by the very famous bhajan 'payo ji maine ram ratan dhan payo.''Salman Khan is playing a double role in the movie one is of a common man and the other is of a prince. While Sonam Kapoor is playing the role of a princess.Salman Khan had confessd in many interviews that to play Prem in Prem Ratan Dhan Payo was very difficult for him because the character he is playing in the movie is very pure and innocent. Not many people know that Salman Khan cried many times while shooting emotional scenes for Prem Ratan Dhan Payo. Shocking: You'll Not Believe Salman Hated This About PRDP 1/6
